name: Time is a Curse
description:
Time is slowly stoping.

You goal is to get the key and go back to the door before time completely stops.

There also are some ennemies, but they're just here to help you get some bonus time.

Only 10 levels at the moment but I hope you will have fun.

note for Mac users : you may need to move the game file in an other repertory in order to launch it.
